title: Sum of Powers in Range
description: In this lab, we will explore a JavaScript function that calculates the sum of powers in a given range of numbers. You will learn how to use built-in array methods such as fill(), map(), and reduce() to perform mathematical operations efficiently. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to customize the function's input parameters to suit your needs.

meta.title: Mastering JavaScript: Calculating Sums of Powers
meta.description: Explore a versatile JavaScript function to efficiently calculate the sum of powers within a given range of numbers.
